description: TradeMetrics Pro is the world's first AI-Powered Trading Psychology Platform that transforms trading performance with AI psychology coaching, advanced analytics, and automated trade tracking. Now expanding into custom Expert Advisor development services.
serviceDescription: Professional EA development services for MT4/MT5 traders. We convert your TradingView strategies, Pine Script indicators, and manual trading systems into fully automated Expert Advisors.
history: TradeMetrics Pro was built to help traders improve their performance through AI-powered psychology coaching and advanced analytics. With active MT4 and MT5 integrations already in place, expanding into EA development is a natural evolution to provide traders with complete automation solutions.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.quote: The Psychology Coach changed everything. My win rate went from 45% to 68% in 2 months. Game changer!

testimonials.name: Sarah Williams
testimonials.quote: Best trading journal I've ever used. The emotion tracking helped me identify patterns I never knew existed.

testimonials.name: David Kumar
testimonials.quote: MT4 integration is seamless. Analytics dashboard is incredibly powerful yet easy to understand.

mission: To empower traders worldwide with AI-powered tools that improve psychology, automate strategies, and maximize trading performance.
brandTone: Professional, innovative, trustworthy, data-driven, modern fintech aesthetic
designStyle: Dark mode, glassmorphism effects, gradient accents, trading charts/graphs aesthetic, clean modern UI
